description:
goprotobuf: Rename UnmarshalAppend to UnmarshalMerge.

"Merge" is the term used in C++ (and other languages),
and "append" doesn't correctly capture the semantics for non-repeated fields.

messages.text:
Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=31e1306dcf36 ***

goprotobuf: Rename UnmarshalAppend to UnmarshalMerge.

"Merge" is the term used in C++ (and other languages),
and "append" doesn't correctly capture the semantics for non-repeated fields.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7103060

subject: code review 7103060: goprotobuf: Rename UnmarshalAppend to UnmarshalMerge.
